personalInfo.name: Charbel Daher
personalInfo.bio:
My journey into technology began at university, where I started with absolutely no prior coding knowledge. During my first year, I discovered my passion for programming and quickly dove deep into the world of Artificial Intelligence. I started by taking courses on Coursera, specifically from DeepLearning.AI, which laid the foundation for my understanding of machine learning and neural networks.

To solidify my knowledge, I adopted a hands-on approach, building numerous projects that challenged me to apply what I was learning. This practical experience proved invaluable as I transitioned into professional roles, starting with internships where I honed my skills in real-world environments.

Since then, I have been on a continuous path of learning and growth. I am constantly exploring new technologies, refining my craft, and pushing the boundaries of what I can build. Today, as an AI Engineer, I combine that initial spark of curiosity with years of dedicated practice to create intelligent, efficient, and impactful software solutions.

education.school: Lebanese University - Faculty of Engineering II
education.degree: Bachelors in Computer and communication Engineering

experience.description: Designed and deployed AI and agent-based applications using LLMs, PydanticAI, and custom logic for chatbots, document parsing, and task automation. Built backend services with FastAPI, SQLModel, and SQLAlchemy, integrated with MySQL, PostgreSQL, and Elasticsearch, and containerized deployments with Docker. Vibe coded many frontend (Typescript+React) apps using AI-assisted coding

AI and Computer Vision internship covering machine learning, NLP, NVIDIA Omniverse, deep learning, GIT, docker, mlflow. For the final project, I trained yolov7 and created FCN for segmentation from scratch, wrote an Api and dockerize it
Data analysis, machine learning, nlp, mlops, project lifecycle, agile. For the final project, I created a recipe recommendation app with an api and dockerize it.
I completed Microsoft AI-900 and AI-102 courses, focusing on Azure AI fundamentals and solutions, while also developing and ensuring high-quality AI courses, content, and labs.

projects.title: Personal Website
projects.short_summary: My personal portfolio website showcasing projects, experience, and skills as an AI Engineer.
projects.description: My personal portfolio website showcasing projects, experience, and skills as an AI Engineer.

projects.title: WhatsApp Agent
projects.short_summary: An intelligent WhatsApp bot powered by AI for automated messaging and interactions.
projects.description: An intelligent WhatsApp bot powered by AI for automated messaging and interactions.

projects.title: ANIP - Automated News Intelligence Pipeline
projects.short_summary: An end-to-end automated pipeline for collecting, processing, and analyzing news articles with machine learning.
projects.description: An end-to-end automated pipeline for collecting, processing, and analyzing news articles with machine learning. It features automated data ingestion from multiple sources, distributed ML processing with Spark, model management with MLflow, and a REST API with an AI agent for intelligent news search and analysis.

projects.title: Structured DB Agnostic Query Builder
projects.short_summary: A database-agnostic natural language query builder that converts natural language queries into structured database queries (MongoDB & Elasticsearch) using LLM-powered structured output.
projects.description: This project provides a clean, extensible architecture for converting natural language queries into database-specific query languages. It uses OpenAI's language models with structured Pydantic outputs to ensure type-safe query generation. Key features include database agnostic design, type-safe validation, LLM-powered query generation, and support for MongoDB and Elasticsearch.

projects.title: Modular Training Framework
projects.short_summary: A clean, extensible training framework for fine-tuning language models on any task (NER, QA, Classification) using LoRA and PEFT.
projects.description: A modular framework designed to adapt the same training pipeline to any task by implementing just DataProcessor and Evaluator components. Features automated GGUF conversion, LoRA fine-tuning, and support for tasks like NER, Question Answering, and Text Classification.

projects.title: Jarvis Voice Assistant
projects.short_summary: A modular voice-controlled assistant with an extensible tool system powered by LLM-based intelligent routing.
projects.description: A modular voice-controlled assistant featuring continuous listening, intelligent tool routing, and parallel execution. It includes a powerful Playwright agent for web automation with vision capabilities, Gmail integration, and a multi-engine search tool. The system uses LLMs to automatically select and execute the best tools for any given task.

projects.title: HAIR â€“ Human AI Resources
projects.short_summary: An AI-powered recruitment platform designed to modernize and streamline the hiring process using LLMs, semantic search, and multi-agent systems.
projects.description: HAIR (Human AI Resources) is an AI-powered recruitment platform designed to modernize and streamline the hiring process. It combines large language models, semantic search, structured parsing, and multi-agent AI systems to reduce manual effort, improve candidate-job matching, and enable data-driven hiring decisions. Key features include Resume Parsing Engine, AI Job Description Generator, Semantic Candidate Matching, Conversational AI Assistant, and multiagent system AI Interviewer.
